DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate effectiveness nurse case management lung cancer patient Taiwan medical center .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Nursing Case Management Lung Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : The study investigate effectiveness nurse case management lung cancer patient Taiwan medical center . The outcome variable include percentage patient accept treatment medical center , average lengths stay , unplanned re-admission rate , average admission time emergency department per year , percentages patient reject treatment , complete rate treatment , withdraw rate treatment , improve rate patient ' treatment compliance , patient ' satisfaction healthcare , staff ' satisfaction case management . Methods : The study employ quasi-experimental research design . The patient new-diagnosed lung cancer accept case management assign experimental group； The patient new-diagnosed lung cancer period one year ago without accept case management assign control group；The third group patient non-new-diagnosed lung cancer accept case management . The staff doctor within lung cancer medical team . The lung cancer case management database , patient ' satisfaction questionnaire , staff ' satisfaction questionnaire use measure effectiveness . Statistical software SPSS Windows version 17.0 use analyze data . Expected result : The research outcome confirm impact case management lung cancer patient could reference data future cancer case management model .
DOC.criteria: patient lung cancer young 20 year old
